ygData.subject: Re: New Topic, Languages!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: yes, do the following. set up a hot button and on all five lines do something like the following: /g line 1 /g line 2 /g line 3 /g line 4 /g line 5 then change
ygData.messageBody:
yes, do the following.

set up a hot button and on all five lines do something like the following:

/g line 1
/g line 2
/g line 3
/g line 4
/g line 5

then change your lang to what you want everyone else to learn, and spam
away... get a large group and have everyone speak a different language.
Only one person needs to speak the language for the whole group to learn.

Chris.

> -----Original Message-----

> To: 'eqpaladin@onelist.com'
> Subject: [eqpaladin] Re: New Topic, Languages!!!
>
>
> From: Rodney Miller <RMiller@...>
>
> Ahh, you have to be in a group..that was the link that I was
> missing. So if
> I am in a group, does the whole group have to be speaking that
> language? Or
> can I just be speaking gibberish to them? Can you use a pre set up /say
> macro on one of your hot buttons?
>
> Thanks for the info.
>
> Grod
> Paladin of the 14th Level
> Innoruuk Server
>
